title: Claude Code + VS Code: Power‑User Tips
summary: Turn Claude into a force multiplier inside VS Code: custom commands, MCP servers, and context tricks I actually use.

body.raw:
- Put project‑specific `CLAUDE.md` at the repo root
- Add `@DOCS/*.md` includes for architecture/context
- Register Context7 + Sequential MCP for research + multi‑step reasoning
- Create tasks.json wrappers so you can run `/optimize` hotkeys
